wikipedia_page.main: Craig Mather (born 1971) is a British businessman and was the Chief Operating Officer and Chief Executive of Rangers Football Club.

response: In July 2013, Pandža was linked with a move to Scottish League One side Rangers. He then began talks with the club over possibly joining Rangers. He himself pleaded to Rangers, quoting: "come and get him" and even willing to risk his wages. Despite the expected agreement which lasted for two months, the move appeared to be stalled. The move was stalled, which was believed to put on hold by the club's chief executive Craig Mather and Pandža would later accuse the club of lacking professionalism for shattering his move to Rangers.
Charles Green stepped down as Rangers CEO in April 2013 and was replaced by Craig Mather.
